spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The elf wears a suit of elven chain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elf makes two Scimitar attacks and uses Radiant Beam (if available).

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Beam (3/Day)
entries: A magical beam of radiance flashes out from the elf's hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Starlight Step (3/Day)
entries: The elf magically teleports up to 30 feet, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus.name: Summon Solar Dragon (1/Day)
entries: The elf has a 50 percent chance of magically summoning a {@creature young solar dragon|BAM}. A summoned dragon appears in an unoccupied space that the summoner can see, acts on its own initiative count, and is an ally of its summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.
